title: rustdoc: unwrap of none: src/librustdoc/passes/collect_intra_doc_links.rs

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![deny(broken_intra_doc_links)] #![feature(no_core, lang_items)] #![no_core] #![crate_type = "rlib"] // @has prim_methods_local/index.html // @has - '//*[@id="main"]//a[@href="{{channel}}/std/primitive.char.html"]' 'char' // @has - '//*[@id="main"]//a[@href="{{channel}}/std/primitive.char.html#method.len_utf8"]' 'char::len_utf8' //! A [`char`] and its [`char::len_utf8`]. #[lang = "char"] impl char { pub fn len_utf8(self) -> usize { 42 } } #[lang = "sized"] pub trait Sized {} #[lang = "clone"] pub trait Clone: Sized {} #[lang = "copy"] pub trait Copy: Clone {} ``` ### Meta ``` rustdoc 1.62.0-nightly (4ca19e09d 2022-04-19) binary: rustdoc commit-hash: 4ca19e09d302a4cbde14f9cb1bc109179dc824cd commit-date: 2022-04-19 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.62.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` warning: lint `broken_intra_doc_links` has been renamed to `rustdoc::broken_intra_doc_links` --> ./2/124faa9a636ffb9d3b3e979c3a21689b2a5f7b16.rs:1:9 | 1 | #![deny(broken_intra_doc_links)] | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ help: use the new name: `rustdoc::broken_intra_doc_links` | = note: `#[warn(renamed_and_removed_lints)]` on by default error[E0522]: definition of an unknown language item: `char` --> ./2/124faa9a636ffb9d3b3e979c3a21689b2a5f7b16.rs:13:1 | 13 | #[lang = "char"] | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ definition of unknown language item `char` error[E0390]: cannot define inherent `impl` for primitive types --> ./2/124faa9a636ffb9d3b3e979c3a21689b2a5f7b16.rs:14:6 | 14 | impl char { | ^^^^ | = help: consider using an extension trait instead ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/librustdoc/passes/collect_intra_doc_links.rs:94:89 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f070f09d85d - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::hd79e9b51bb0b02a3 at /rustc/4ca19e09d302a4cbde14f9cb1bc109179dc824cd/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f070f09d85d -
